DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavior Therapy Insomnia : Analysis Components , Mediators Moderators
DOC.criteria: Presence insomnia three night per week three month . Insomnia despite adequate opportunity sleep . Insomnia severity typical insomnia disorder , i.e . 11 point Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) . Nighttime insomnia symptom , i.e. , two point least one first three ISI question . Daytime insomnia symptom , i.e . two point one ISI distress impairment item ( number 5 7 ) . Clinical insomnia symptom sleep diary concern three nighttime symptom ( difficulty sleep initiation , difficulty sleep maintenance , early morning awakening ) , i.e. , thirty minute average one symptom . No current past CBTI treatment within past 5 year . Time opportunity participate treatment ten week . Time opportunity read approximately fifteen page per week execute homework assignment ten week . Access computer , email internet . Severe depression , i.e. , 30 point MADRSS . Suicidal risk , i.e. , 4 point item 9 MADRSS . A high intake alcohol caffeine , Insomnia due shiftwork sleepdisturbing event ( e.g. , pregnancy , small child , animal sleep environment ) . Participants history psychotic bipolar disorder . If somatic condition report , require relatively stable and/or candidate receiving treatment condition . When candidate fulfills criteria psychiatric somatic condition , require insomnia disorder currently distress disable insomnia remain despite treatment comorbid condition . Participants follow primary sleep disorder exclude via Duke Structured Interview Sleep Disorders ( DSISD ) : sleep apnea , restless legs syndrome , periodic limb movement disorder , circadian rhythm disorder , parasomnias . If sleep medication use , require use relatively stable three month . If Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRI ) use report , require onset medication least three month prior telephone interview . Participants regularly consume sleepdisturbing medication .
